member.summary: zk集群连接字符串，如127.0.0.1:2181,127.0.0.1:2182(多个server之间用,隔开)

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.IDs.AUTH_IDS
member.summary: This Id is only usable to set ACLs. It will get substituted with the Id's the client authenticated with.

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.IDs.OPEN_ACL_UNSAFE
member.summary: This is a completely open ACL .

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.IDs.CREATOR_ALL_ACL
member.summary: This ACL gives the creators authentication id's all permissions.

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.IDs.READ_ACL_UNSAFE
member.summary: This ACL gives the world the ability to read.

member.name: P:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.Stat.Ctime
member.summary: 从此ZNode创建到现在为止的时间毫秒数

member.name: P:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.Stat.Mtime
member.summary: 从此ZNode上次修改到现在为止的时间毫秒数

member.name: P:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.Stat.EphemeralOwner
member.summary: 如果此ZNode是一个瞬时节点，此值表示此ZNode对应的会话ID。如果不是瞬时节点则为0

member.name: T:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ZoookError
member.summary: Codes which represent the various KeeperException types. This enum replaces the deprecated earlier static final int constants. The old, deprecated, values are in "camel case" while the new enum values are in all CAPS.

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ZoookError.SYSTEMERROR
member.summary: System and server-side errors. This is never thrown by the server, it shouldn't be used other than to indicate a range. Specifically error codes greater than this value, but lesser than {@link #APIERROR}, are system errors.

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ZoookError.CONNECTIONLOSS
member.summary: Connection to the server has been lost

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ZoookError.MARSHALLINGERROR
member.summary: Error while marshalling or unmarshalling data

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ZoookError.APIERROR
member.summary: API errors. This is never thrown by the server, it shouldn't be used other than to indicate a range. Specifically error codes greater than this value are API errors (while values less than this indicate a {@link #SYSTEMERROR}).

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ZoookError.NOCHILDRENFOREPHEMERALS
member.summary: Ephemeral nodes may not have children

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ZoookError.SESSIONEXPIRED
member.summary: The session has been expired by the server

member.name: F:Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ZoookError.SESSIONMOVED
member.summary: Session moved to another server, so operation is ignored

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.AddAuthInfo(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Add the specified scheme:auth information to this connection.

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.Register(Sodao.Zookeeper.IWatcher)
member.summary: Specify the default watcher for the connection (overrides the one specified during construction).

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.Create(System.String,System.Byte[],Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ACL[],Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.CreateMode)
member.summary: Create a node with the given path. The node data will be the given data, and node acl will be the given acl.
member.param: specifying whether the node to be created is ephemeral and/or sequential.

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.Delete(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Delete the node with the given path. The call will succeed if such a node exists, and the given version matches the node's version (if the given version is -1, it matches any node's versions).
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.NoNode will be thrown if the nodes does not exist.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.BadVersion will be thrown if the given version does not match the node's version.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.NotEmpty will be thrown if the node has children.
This operation, if successful, will trigger all the watches on the node of the given path left by exists API calls, and the watches on the parent node left by getChildren API calls.

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.Exists(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Return the stat of the node of the given path. Return null if no such a node exists.
If the watch is true and the call is successful (no exception is thrown), a watch will be left on the node with the given path. The watch will be triggered by a successful operation that creates/delete the node or sets the data on the node.
member.param: whether need to watch this node
member.returns: the stat of the node of the given path; return null if no such a node exists.

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.Exists(System.String,Sodao.Zookeeper.IWatcher)
member.summary:
Return the stat of the node of the given path. Return null if no such a node exists.
If the watch is non-null and the call is successful (no exception is thrown), a watch will be left on the node with the given path. The watch will be triggered by a successful operation that creates/delete the node or sets the data on the node.
member.returns: the stat of the node of the given path; return null if no such a node exists.

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.GetData(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Return the data and the stat of the node of the given path.
member.param: whether need to watch this node

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.GetData(System.String,Sodao.Zookeeper.IWatcher)
member.summary: Return the data and the stat of the node of the given path.

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.SetData(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary:
Set the data for the node of the given path if such a node exists and the given version matches the version of the node (if the given version is -1, it matches any node's versions). Return the stat of the node.
This operation, if successful, will trigger all the watches on the node of the given path left by getData calls.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.NoNode will be thrown if no node with the given path exists.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.BadVersion will be thrown if the given version does not match the node's version.
The maximum allowable size of the data array is 1 MB (1,048,576 bytes). Arrays larger than this will cause a KeeperExecption to be thrown.

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.GetACL(System.String)
member.summary: Return the ACL and stat of the node of the given path. A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.NoNode will be thrown if no node with the given path exists.
member.param: the given path for the node

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.SetACL(System.String,Sodao.Zookeeper.Data.ACL[],System.Int32)
member.summary:
Set the ACL for the node of the given path if such a node exists and the given version matches the version of the node. Return the stat of the node.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.NoNode will be thrown if no node with the given path exists.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.BadVersion will be thrown if the given version does not match the node's version.

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.GetChildren(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Return the list of the children of the node of the given path.
If the watch is non-null and the call is successful (no exception is thrown), a watch will be left on the node with the given path. The watch willbe triggered by a successful operation that deletes the node of the given path or creates/delete a child under the node.
The list of children returned is not sorted and no guarantee is provided as to its natural or lexical order.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.NoNode will be thrown if no node with the given path exists.
member.returns: an unordered array of children of the node with the given path

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.GetChildren(System.String,Sodao.Zookeeper.IWatcher)
member.summary:
Return the list of the children of the node of the given path.
If the watch is non-null and the call is successful (no exception is thrown), a watch will be left on the node with the given path. The watch willbe triggered by a successful operation that deletes the node of the given path or creates/delete a child under the node.
The list of children returned is not sorted and no guarantee is provided as to its natural or lexical order.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.NoNode will be thrown if no node with the given path exists.
member.returns: an unordered array of children of the node with the given path

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.GetChildren2(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
For the given znode path return the stat and children list.
If the watch is true and the call is successful (no exception is thrown), a watch will be left on the node with the given path. The watch willbe triggered by a successful operation that deletes the node of the given path or creates/delete a child under the node.
The list of children returned is not sorted and no guarantee is provided as to its natural or lexical order.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.NoNode will be thrown if no node with the given path exists.

member.name: M:Sodao.Zookeeper.IZookClient.GetChildren2(System.String,Sodao.Zookeeper.IWatcher)
member.summary:
For the given znode path return the stat and children list.
If the watch is true and the call is successful (no exception is thrown), a watch will be left on the node with the given path. The watch willbe triggered by a successful operation that deletes the node of the given path or creates/delete a child under the node.
The list of children returned is not sorted and no guarantee is provided as to its natural or lexical order.
A KeeperException with error code KeeperException.NoNode will be thrown if no node with the given path exists.

member.summary: validate the provided znode path string

member.returns: server view of the path (chroot prepended to client path)
